name: OTHER SIDES - the dark ways (Purple Panzer)
name_original: OTHER SIDES - the dark ways (Purple Panzer)
description:
A psychological survival horror game, the scenario took place in real haunted places. The game having a long gameplay with automatic saving system in checkpoints. WARNING: This game includes flashing lights, jump scares

WASD - moving 

E - action 

SPACE - jump

 F - flashlight 

TAB - inventory
